1525483017_1EHjrNgbVBWHQ7BiKwqKD6pSbowep.body: enjoy the time away from anything that can hurt you. Don't go to the "quiet room" if you can help it.
Ask the nurses who look foreign what ube ice cream is. pronounced oo-bay.

> [quantumday3](#comment_16_1EHjrNgbVBWHQ7BiKwqKD6pSbowepFP8sf): i need to go home at least by monday

Don't sweat when you get out. They are seeing how well you can handle the stress. Keep well groomed, act normal, and be social and you will be out in a jiff.

1525597646_1CT7RxDQNPEE8X78bDkUPhuaaUUix.body: have you used Zeronet on android? You just start the app and navigate using your browser of choice.
